patthana9.1:6.1: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.1:6.2: nahetuṃ akusalaṃ abyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana9.1:6.3: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetuṃ nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.1:6.4: nahetū akusale abyākate khandhe paṭicca hetū.
patthana9.1:6.5: Nahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.1:7.1: Nanahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:7.2: Nanahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:7.3: Nanahetuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.1:8.1: Nahetuṃ nakusalañca nanahetuṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:8.2: Nahetuṃ nakusalañca nanahetuṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:8.3: Nahetuṃ nakusalañca nanahetuṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo ca nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:10.1: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … naāhāre … pe … namagge ekaṃ … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana9.1:13.1: Nanahetu nakusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.1:13.2: Nanahetu nakusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.1:13.3: Nanahetu nakusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa ca nanahetussa nakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana9.1:14.1: Nahetu nakusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana9.1:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava … pe … upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi … pe … kamme tīṇi … pe … āhāre tīṇi … pe … jhāne tīṇi … pe … vippayutte pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana9.1:16.1: Nahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.1:16.2: nahetuṃ kusalaṃ abyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana9.1:16.6: nahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.1:16.7: nahetū kusale abyākate khandhe paṭicca hetū.
patthana9.1:16.8: Nahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo ca nanahetu naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.1:17.1: Nanahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:17.2: Nanahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:17.3: Nanahetuṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo ca nanahetu naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.1:18.1: Nahetuṃ naakusalañca nanahetuṃ naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:18.2: Nahetuṃ naakusalañca nanahetuṃ naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:18.3: Nahetuṃ naakusalañca nanahetuṃ naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo ca nanahetu naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:20.1: Nahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.1:20.2: kusalākusalaṃ nahetuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā, tayo khandhe paṭicca eko khandho.
patthana9.1:20.3: Nahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:20.4: Nahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato ca nanahetu naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.1:21.1: Nanahetuṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.1:22.1: Nahetuṃ naabyākatañca nanahetuṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:22.2: Nahetuṃ naabyākatañca nanahetuṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.1:22.3: Nahetuṃ naabyākatañca nanahetuṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naabyākato ca nanahetu naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
